concept.title: What is CryptoGuard?
concept.shortdesc: CryptoGuard is web exchange/wallet that makes entering the crypto market easier.

conbody.p: With CryptoGuard you can transfer and exchange Crypto for fiat money, swap different Cryptocurrencies, trade and hold your assets securely in the CryptoGuard wallet.

section.title: What are the benefits of using CryptoGuard?

ol.li: CryptoGuard wallet is a software application for smartphones and desktop computers that lets users interact with dozens of blockchains. Despite what the name implies, CryptoGuard is non-custodial, it does not store any funds.
In addition to being non-custodial, CryptoGuard routinely undergoes security audits. This wallet is renowned for its ease of navigation, which may come at an expense of more advanced features.
One of the most handy features of the exchange/wallet is in-app cryptocurrency exchange.
